description: Real Time Availability Check (RTAC) holding summary details

instanceId.description: The FOLIO id of the instance

id.description: The FOLIO id of the piece

type.description: Type of source for RTAC record

status.description: The availability status of the holding

suppressFromDiscovery.description: Indicate if record should not be displayed in a discovery system

copiesRemaining.description: The number of copies remaining in the form of 'n of n copies remaining'
